Container.Name: CherryMusic
Container.Overview: [h3]CherryMusic[/h3]A music streaming server written in python: Stream your own music collection to all your devices![br]
Container.Description: [h3]CherryMusic[/h3]A music streaming server written in python: Stream your own music collection to all your devices![br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is where CherryMusic will store it\'s configuration files.[br] [b]/media[/b] : this path is where CherryMusic will look for music files.[br]
